overview:
Over the last 15 years, Philip has twice built 100-person engineering organizations and brought to market five products from concept to delivery, including the leading agile BI platform Endeca Latitude.

As CTO of Hadapt, Wickline will oversee the development of Hadaptâ€™s flagship database product and define the companyâ€™s long-term product roadmap. Wickline was formerly with Endeca, an enterprise search and Business Intelligence (BI) software company, where he served as VP Engineering and Chief Software Architect.

external_links.title: Hadapt Expands Executive Team with CTO Philip Wickline
